definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: (= Bab. abal-iddina, he hath given a son COT 2Ki 20:12) father of [[מְרׂדַךְ]] [[בַּלְאֲדָן]] king of Babylon (v. sub [[מְרׂדַךְ]]) 2Ki 20:12 = Is 39:1; name prob. abbreviated by omission of name of god (v. ib. Merodach-baladan = Marduk-abal-iddina, Marduk hath given a son; cf. Esarhaddon, v. [[אֵסַרְחַדּׂן]] p. 64).
